import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { JwtHelperService } from '@auth0/angular-jwt'; @Component({ selector: 'app-feeds', templateUrl: './feeds.component.html', styleUrls: ['./feeds.component.css'] }) export class FeedsComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private jwtHelper: JwtHelperService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.isUserAuthenticated } isUserAuthenticated() { const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); if (token && !this.jwtHelper.isTokenExpired(token)) { return true; } else { return false; } } }
